name: Vegan Sausage
description: If you're looking for an authentic vegan sausage, this is the right recipe for you! These vegan Italian sausages with sun-dried tomatoes are packed with flavor and they have the perfect meaty texture. They taste amazing and they're really easy to make!
recipeIngredient: 1/2 teaspoon guar gum (for example Bob's Red Mill)
1/2 cup sun-dried tomatoes in oil, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat some oil in a small pan. Add the onion andcook for 2 minutes. Then add the garlic and cook for another 1-2 minutes untilthe onion is translucent. Set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Place all of the ingredients expect for theonion, the garlic, the sun-dried tomatoes, and the vital wheat gluten into afood processor and process until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the sauteed onion and garlic and the finelychopped sun-dried tomatoes to the pureed tofu mixture and stir well.

recipeInstructions.text: Then add the vital wheat gluten and knead thedough with your hands. Only knead it until everything is combined and the vitalwheat gluten is completely incorporated. You don’t want to knead it for toolong as the sausages will get very chewy.

recipeInstructions.text: Divide the dough into 8 equal-sized pieces.Shape each piece into a sausage. Then tightly wrap each sausage into two layersof aluminium foil. Twist the ends of the foil.

recipeInstructions.text: Add about 1 inch of water into a large pot witha steamer basket. Bring to boil. When the water is boiling, add the sausages tothe steamer basket and steam for 40 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: When the 40 minutes are over, remove the sausagesand let them cool down completely in the aluminium foil. Then place them in thefridge until you’re ready to serve them. I recommend storing them in the fridgeovernight for the perfect texture.
